snippet: The National Park Service agreed Monday to let Grand Canyon National Park impose a ban on small, disposable water containers.
abstract: National Park Service agrees to let Grand Canyon National Park impose a ban on small, disposable water containers, which make up about 20 percent of the park's overall waste stream.
lead_paragraph: The National Park Service agreed Monday to let Grand Canyon National Park impose a ban on small, disposable water containers.

headline.main: Arizona: Disposable Bottles to Be Banned at Park
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Disposable Bottles To Be Banned at Park
